sorry multiplayer works but the singleplayer wont, and when i try connecting to a serv, it says key in use. im guessing i need to find a cracked serv?

THIS IS FOR EVERYONE WITH Error : iw3sp has stopped working.

Solution : 

Go to Control Panel
Open SOUNDS
Select Recording TAB
ENABLE Stereo Mix

THATS ALL !!!!

http://imageshack.us/f/690/cod4help.jpg/
